title: peerless1
author: peerless1
content: Hey folks,I'm in the market for a Crypto Casino source code, something on the lines of Stake or BC.game. Here's what I need:Tech: The source code in Node.js or PHP. Look & Feel: Aiming for something that looks and feels like Stake or BC.game. If it's close, I'm interested.Demo: A demo's a must-have. I need to check out what it can do before we deal.Contact: Drop me your contact details (PM works too) so we can chat more about the specifics.Deal: We'll be doing this deal through escrow for safety and transparency.Cheers,

comments.author: testm
comments.body: dm me your telegram .or contact me @mrbit2020
